subject: [R] Population genetics tests for neutral evolution
body:
Dear R,
I am working with DNA data (nexus-Format) and want to do some populationgenetics analysis. There are some standard test for neutral evolution,e.g. Tajima's D, Fu+-Li's D, the McDonald Kreitman test and the HKAtest. 
Does anyone know, if these tests are already implemented in R (or maybeBioconductor)?
Many thanks,Peter
